short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture Web page and image from your screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DiscoverApp is the easiest way to capture images from various sites to create digital inspirations, storyboards, conceptboards for your product collection design and development.
In just one click you can capture web content and images and save it in SimplexMLM.
long.ru:
DiscoverApp is the easiest way to add image from various sites for inspirations of garment industry design and development.
In just one click you can select the and crop images and save it in SimplexMLM.
